response.original_title: Oupa En Ouma Sit Op Die Stoep
response.overview: Ouma en Oupa sit op die Stoep ... was written and directed by Leon Kruger. The program is based on the eponymous stage production. It's a situation comedy built around the actors Lida and Johan Botha, who make their appearance as Stanley and Deborah Vermeulen, or Grandpa and Grandma. It deals with various aspects of growing older and their adjustment to be grandparents. Deborah's niece, Anna, lives with them in the house, and Patience is the insistence of their son, Seuna appointed as their nurse
response.title: Oupa En Ouma Sit Op Die Stoep
